verbs.description: [V: healing] [ARG1: the emotional wounds of war] [ARGM-MNR: through song] there are a lot of therapy programs for veterans suffering from ptsd but only a few use professional musicians thomas faulk mary judd mary gauthier posttraumatic stress disorder nashville tennessee darden smith lisa army sgt joshua geartz iraq manhattan
